de.tud.cs.se.ws15.kaesekaestchen_fancy_100_ex12.entity

Class Map

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tud.cs.se.ws15.kaesekaestchen_fancy_100_ex12.entity.Map

  • public class Map
extends Object
    This Class contains the Entities needed for the game loop, manages their ID's and marks them as owned or selected.
    Author:
    paddy

    • Method Detail

      • markEdge

        public int markEdge(int edgeID,
                    Player markingPlayer)
        Marks the Edge and increments the surrounding fields.
        Parameters:
        edgeID - = Edge to be marked.
        markingPlayer - = Player selecting this edge.
        Returns:
        the amount of points made by this selection.

      • markEdge

        public int markEdge(int edgeID,
                    Player markingPlayer,
                    boolean impact)
        Marks an edge and calculates the amount of fields doing so closed.
        Parameters:
        edgeID - the ID of the edge that should be marked
        markingPlayer - the player whose turn it is and who is supposed to earn the points
        impact - decides whether surrounding fields change their owner, if a field is closed again
        Returns:
        the amount of points earned or -1 if the player gets another turn because the selected edge has already been marked

      • countMarkedFields

        public int countMarkedFields(int edgeID,
                             Player markingPlayer,
                             boolean impact)
        * Counts the amount of marked fields around the edge with edgeID.
        Parameters:
        edgeID - the edge marked
        markingPlayer - the currently active player who will receive the points
        impact - decides whether surrounding fields change their owner, if a field is closed again
        Returns:
        the amount of points gained by the marking player

      • removeUnmarkedIndex

        public boolean removeUnmarkedIndex(int edgeID)
        Tries to remove an ID of an edge from the list of unmarked edges.
        Parameters:
        edgeID - the ID of the edge to be unmarked
        Returns:
        true iff removing was successful i.e. if the edge was unmarked before

      • undo

        public boolean undo(int edgeID)
        This undoes the marking of an edge if it has been marked and decrements the number of marked edges of a field.
        Parameters:
        edgeID - = The ID of the edge to be unmarked.
        Returns:
        true if the edge has been marked before.

        public Edge[] getEdges()
        FindBugs claims this might "expose internal representation" but it needs to be public for the tests
        Returns:
        the array of the edges
